meanings.definition: Make (something, typically a bomb or alarm) inactive by disconnecting or destroying it.
meanings.sent1: The technician was deactivating the bomb to prevent an explosion.
meanings.sent2: She deactivates the alarm every morning before opening the store.
meanings.sent3: After deactivating the bomb, the technician let out a sigh of relief.
meanings.sent4: The deactivating of the alarm was like silencing a noisy bird.
meanings.sent5: The process of deactivating the bomb was nerve-wracking but necessary.

meanings.definition: Cause (a person or their account) to become inactive or no longer accessible.
meanings.sent1: The company decided to deactivating his account due to inactivity.
meanings.sent2: She deactivates the old accounts to keep the database clean.
meanings.sent3: His attempt to log in failed after deactivating his own account by mistake.
meanings.sent4: Deactivating his account felt like closing a chapter in his online life.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of deactivating the wrong account were immediate and frustrating.
